AI Dev Kit
Table of Contents

Class ChatSession

Namespace
Glitch9.AIDevKit

Represents a single chat session, including its metadata, settings, messages, and serialization logic. Provides support for saving, loading, summarizing, and auto-saving the session.

public class ChatSession
